channel.title: Robotics on Kaitlyn Fichtner
channel.description: Recent content in Robotics on Kaitlyn Fichtner

item.title: Dynamic Sorting Robotic Arm
item.description: Objective Using a 3-dof robotic arm with a camera positioned above its task space, my team of 3 used computer vision to detect, locate, and sort objects by color and size. Summary Applied transformation matrices to convert pixel coordinates to positions in the task space Implemented image segmentation techniques and color masking to locate and sort objects by color and size Utilized inverse differential kinematic controls for smoother movements Continuously searched the task space so that the arm could dynamically follow moving objects Built a URDF simulation of the robot Â View GitHub Repository View Video View Project Report
